Simple model
^^^^^^^^^^^^

DataLab Simple Client provides a simple model for accessing the DataLab
objects.

.. warning::

    This model is not complete and does not cover all the DataLab features.

.. autoclass:: cdlclient.simplemodel.SignalObj
    :members:

    :members:
